Polar FT1 heart rate monitor

  • You will hear a sound notification about the desired heart rate during training;
  • You will see an informative graphical indicator of target training heart rate zones;
  • You will also see information about the calorie consumption per workout;
  • You can view data for 10 workouts.

customer reviews

Irina Ivanchenko
2 half marathons
I didn’t know what to buy for myself - I turned to the guys from RunSmart - they picked up a heart rate monitor that suited my goals and financial capabilities. After some time, I decided to update the gadget - without hesitation, I turned to the same place.

New goals - new gadget!

Thanks RunSmart!
Ivan Syomochkin
1 half marathons
Cool thing - a heart rate monitor. I usually run without them. Turns out he only made it worse.
I bought a heart rate monitor, I also received a workout as a gift. They had the first training together with me, taught me how to use a new gadget. They also explained the basics of anatomy, made a training plan for the month ahead.

With them, I prepared for my first half marathon! Thanks!!!
Julia Dashkina
2 half marathons
I could not start running for a long time, because. Before that, I started several times, but it became hard and I quit. I heard about RunSmart and running with heart rate control from friends and decided to try it.

I called, the guys asked about my goals and picked up a very interesting option at a discount! Now I run and enjoy running! She has already run 2 half marathons and several shorter races and does not intend to stop!

Thanks!!!
Na Pankráci 1727/86, 140 00 Praha 4-Nusle
